text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Changing position entails the body going from one position to another and going from one location to the next, such as getting out of a chair and into bed, or kneeling or crouching and getting back up.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-Mobility.ChangingPosition](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Mobility.ChangingPosition) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.

comment.value: This Observation resource represents the ChangingPosition concept (NL-CM:4.3.8) of zib Mobility. It can be used together with the [nl-core-Mobility](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-Mobility) profile on the Observation resource, which groups references to the current and other resources on `Observation.hasMember`.
